title: Maintenance Due

details: The vehicle has been taken out of rental rotation until the maintenance is complete. Estimated completion: June 30.

details: The GPS tracking device on SX Raptor 700 has been offline for more than 2 hours. Last known location: Agafay Desert (31.2569° N, 8.3560° W).

title: Sandstorm Warning
message: Severe sandstorm warning for Merzouga area tomorrow
details: Weather service has issued a sandstorm warning for the Merzouga region on June 30, 2023. Wind speeds expected to reach 60 km/h. Consider rescheduling tours in this region.

title: Monthly Report

details: The monthly financial summary for June 2023 has been generated and is ready for review. Total revenue: $2,275. Total expenses: $1,850.

details: Customer John Smith cancelled their booking for June 25-26. Refund has been processed successfully.

title: Scheduled Maintenance

details: SX Raptor 700 is due for its quarterly maintenance check on July 5. Please ensure this vehicle is available on this date.

title: Guide Assignment
